00034 class Application(tkinter.tix.Tk):
00035     """Main app window. Everything starts here.
00036        Keeps the main widgets (menu, upper and right toolbar, console, canvas, XML editor, etc.
00037        Initialises or uses the (common) settings object, the state object and the model object."""
00038     def __init__(self, settings, model, state):
00039         tkinter.tix.Tk.__init__(self)
00040         # load registered settings and default empty state (menu)
00041         
00042         self.settings = settings
00043         self.model    = model
00044         self.state    = state
00045         
00046         self.xmlPaths=None  # ????
00047         self.modulePaths=[] # other directories to import modules from ????
00048 
00049         self.xmlprojfiles={"trunk":    None,
00050                            "geometry": None,
00051                            "mesh":     None} # ???? maybe I should move this 
00052 
00053         self.projState = None # if the app starts with a new project, no project, a previously opened one, etc ... TODO
00054                               # with influence on self.settings (some menu entries have to be disabled with respect to
00055                               # the settings
00056 
00057         self.widgets = None # holds all widgets in an unified way - maybe in a clear to follow tree ????
00058 
00059         self.menuBar=None
00060 
00061         self.upperFrame=None # general buttons like zoom, new, save, entity hierarchy, open editor (xml, python),
00062 
00063         self.canvasFrame=None # left toolbox + cad widget
00064         self.notebook=None
00065         self.leftFrame=None
00066         self.DrawingArea=None
00067         self.XMLeditor=None
00068 
00069         self.lowerConsole=None # with tabs possibility
00070         self.lowerLabelFrame=None # has priority when determining the windows size
00071         self.lowerLabel=None
00072         self.lowerlabelstr=[]
00073 
00074         self.AppTitle=tkinter.StringVar()
00075         self.AppTitle.set("")
00076 
00077         self.readXML() # ??? - settings ???
00078         self.createApp()
00079 
00080     def createApp(self):
00081         self.menuBar=GUI.widgets.menu.MenuToolbar(self,
00082                                                   self.settings["menuXMLPath"],
00083                                                   self.settings["menuIconsPath"])
00084 
00085         self.upperFrame=GUI.widgets.uptoolbox.UpperToolbox(self,
00086                                                            self.settings["upperToolBoxXMLPath"],
00087                                                            self["upperToolBoxIconsPath"])
00088 
00089         self.notebook=tkinter.tix.NoteBook(self)
00090         self.notebook.pack(side="top", fill="both", expand="yes")
00091 
00092         # more like testing purpose
00093         self.lowerLabelFrame=tkinter.Frame(self, borderwidth=0)
00094         self.lowerLabelFrame.pack(side="top", fill="x")
00095         self.lowerlabelstr.append(tkinter.StringVar())
00096         self.lowerLabel=tkinter.Label(self.lowerLabelFrame, textvariable=self.lowerlabelstr[0], relief="sunken")
00097         self.lowerLabel.pack(side="bottom", fill="x")
00098 
00099         # bindings
00100 
00101         self.geometry('%sx%s+0+0' % self.maxsize())
00102 
00103         self.title(self.AppTitle.get())
00104         self.update_idletasks()
00105         self.mainloop()
00106 
00107     def initDrawingArea(self): # should be called after the other widgets are initialiazed.
00108 
00109         self.notebook.add(name="canvas", label="Drawing Area")
00110 
00111         self.DrawingArea=GUI.widgets.canvas.DrawingArea(self, os.path.join(self.basedir, "etc/gui/canvas.xml")) # add setting to settings instance
00112         self.DrawingArea.pack(fill="both", expand="yes", in_=self.notebook.canvas)
00113         self.update_idletasks()
00114 
00115         self.DrawingArea.bind("<Motion>", self.__cb_lowerlabel, add="+")
00116 
00117         self.notebook.add(name="xml", label="XML")
00118         self.XMLeditor=GUI.widgets.XMLeditor.XMLeditor(self, os.path.join(self.basedir, "etc/gui/XMLeditor.xml")) # add setting to settings instance
00119         self.XMLeditor.pack(fill="both", expand="yes", in_=self.notebook.xml)
00120         self.XMLeditor.insert(tkinter.END, 
00121                               self.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].toprettyxml(indent = '   ', 
00122                                                                            encoding=self.xmlprojfiles["geometry"][0].encoding))
00123 
00124 
00125     def readXML(self):
00126         self.xmlPaths=minidom.parse(os.path.join(self.basedir, "etc/paths.xml"))
00127 
00128         for i in self.xmlPaths.getElementsByTagName('ModPath'):
00129             self.modulePaths.append(i.firstChild.data)
00130 
00131         self.lwd=os.path.join(self.basedir, self.xmlPaths.getElementsByTagName("LastWorkingDir")[0].firstChild.data)
00132 
00133     def __cb_lowerlabel(self, event):
00134         self.lowerlabelstr[0].set("x_int = %d, y_int = %d" % (event.x, event.y))
00135 
00136 settings = GUI.common.settings() # start here!
00137 model    = GUI.common.model() 
00138 state    = GUI.common.state()
00139 
00140 root   = Application(settings, model, state)
